summary: Adds a custom craftable 1H/2H Sword to your game.
descriptionHtml:
MY NEW HOT SWORD CHECK IT OUT: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55718/?

[center][img]http://picload.org/image/licccgw/screenshot000.png[/img][/center]

[img]http://picload.org/image/liclwca/screenshot000.png[/img]

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=271920279

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[youtube]KAo1Mxf8oT8[/youtube] [youtube]5H7_MRv2sGc[/youtube]
[youtube]OLWMYT9slLU[/youtube] [youtube]9HH6YBTNkUg[/youtube]

videos by dptheslothking, MCDofficial and Gruntlock thanks a bunch guys! :D

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

So here i wanna share my latest creation with you guys hope you enjoy playing with it as much as i enjoyed making it.

At the moment there is only a craftable Version with a 1H and a 2H variant of the Sword available you can find it in the daedric category.

If you have any questions suggestions about any of my mods please let me now. :)

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Purifier.esp

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF0000]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod

[IMG]http://picload.org/image/liclwca/screenshot000.png[/IMG]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
